metadata.min_stack_comments: New fields added: required_fields, related_integrations, setup

author: Elastic
rule.description: Enrich process events with uname and other command lines that imply Linux system information discovery.
rule.name: Linux System Information Discovery
rule.query:
process where event.type == "start" and
(
  process.name: "uname" or
  (process.name: ("cat", "more", "less") and
  process.args: ("*issue*", "*version*", "*profile*", "*services*", "*cpuinfo*"))
)
